description:
The second Super Mario game to feature 3D gameplay. Coupled with F.L.U.D.D. (a talking water tank that can be used
as a jetpack), Mario must clean the graffiti off of Delfino Isle and return light to the sky.
name: Super Mario Sunshine

0.5.0r2.description:
## Bugs Fixed
* Shadow Mario should no longer cause the entire game to crash
* Yoshi spawn in Delfino should now be fixed
* Pineapple for Sirena Pipe should no longer respawn
* No more rogue Shadow Mario music

## Changes
* A couple of logic changes
* Added Nozzle Boxes as checks (Except for Delfino Plaza boxes)
* Nozzle Rando should be better enforced now
* Deathlink has finally been added (thanks to @vasumv)
* No longer required to use cheat codes, a patch file is now generated instead
* Added filler items now (1Ups that don't do anything as of yet) and 30% extra shines to the pool than the required amount (If possible)

There might be new bugs or certain situations that I might've missed and you can always open an issue or post about it in the official AP discord
0.5.0r2.title: Mario Sunshine AP V0.5.0

0.5.1.description:
## What's Changed
* Update SMS-Release and Lib-Download by @SomeJakeGuy in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/12
0.5.1.title: Mario Sunshine AP V0.5.1

0.5.2.description:
## Main Changes
* Generation now accordingly sets amount of Shines and Blues if there are too many compared to amount of locations available as to minimize generation failures
* Rewrote logic for upcoming difficulty options (More down below about its PR, thanks a bunch again @SomeJakeGuy)
* Fixed SSL error that would occur during patching process 

## PRs/Contributions
* Use world instance random over global random by @gerbiljames in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/17
* Use instance vars for world state by @gerbiljames in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/16
* Update sms_rom to handle downloading the repo assets using a different library / default SSL when able. by @SomeJakeGuy in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/18
* Fixed merge between multiple PRs. by @Griffork in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/19
* Added a Tutorial and OptionGroup for SMSWebWorld. Fixed a warning about settings ClassVar by @SomeJakeGuy in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/20
* Regions and logic re-written into smaller, more manageable files, with a logic parser based on a named-tuple rather than straight lambda statements. by @SomeJakeGuy in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/25
* Jake locations fix by @SomeJakeGuy in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/27

## New Contributors
* @gerbiljames made their first contribution in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/17
* @Griffork made their first contribution in https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/pull/19

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Joshark/archipelago-sms/compare/0.5.1...0.5.2
0.5.2.title: Mario Sunshine AP V0.5.2
